Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: As the budget's release nears people take to social media to express their thoughts. Some posts criticize members of parliament for allegedly being dishonest and taking credit for things they didn't do. Others promote the ACOSS Post Budget Event noting that tickets are selling fast. Additionally some posts highlight the budget's major themes like increasing financial support for single parents and improving economic stability. As budget week begins some people take time to embrace media opportunities while others eagerly anticipate the release of more detailed information.
